name: CharacterControllerDemo
description:
This is a simple test controller for a game I've been working on.

 This test does not represent the final product of the game. this is just a playable demo to show off the controller. 

The goal of this demo is to take down the red rectangle, most of the assets are placeholders and will not be in the final game. 

 Feel free to give me feedback on what you think. 

I plan on making this a casual, party type fps game with split screen in the future.
